title: Gotham Knights & Suicide Squad Info Incoming!? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.31.21
description:
Tamoor Hussain and Gary Whitta unite in a VERY british episode of KFGD! Let's talk Gotham Knights, Suicide Squad: Kill The Justice League, and Metal Gear Online.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:00:50 - Tam and Gary are both British
00:13:51 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report -
00:16:48 - Gotham Knights, Suicide Squad News Coming To DC Fandome
00:26:11 - Naughty Dog Teases Future
00:34:58 - Some Metal Gear Online Services Being Shut Down
00:35:28 - New Dead Space Remake Info
00:47:58 - Ads
00:49:05 - Out Today
00:55:15 - “Should different studios still have control over their studio policies?” - Takibi 
00:58:23 - You‘re Wrong
01:00:59 - Post Show
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Bless & Andy
